text:
Hi

Is it at all possible to create a 'wishlist' on HubSpot where a visitor can add products (products listed on hubdb - no ecommerce) to the wishlist?

Hi <@U01487W4C6B> there are a few ways you could approach this, but the “HubSpot way” I imagine is using HubDB+Serverless functions - <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/features/serverless-functions> (see: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/features/serverless-functions>) in which you can use access the currently active user. You’ll need CMS Hub Enteprise for this.
HS team have built an events app to showcase the functionality (code available on GH) <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/features/serverless-functions/event-registration-app>
